author: rpocklington
title: Kieran Hayler takes Princess to hospital to have pins taken out of her broken arm as Katie Price remains with son Harvey in another hospital
text:
TV Magazine 'BRAVE GIRL' Kieran Hayler takes Princess to hospital to have pins taken out of her broken arm as Katie Price remains with son Harvey in another hospital 
The devoted hubby and step-dad accompanied the youngster as she bravely waited to have the pins removed from her arm By REBECCA POCKLINGTON
